messages.title: We will play a constructive role with new ideas and fresh thinking.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Additional investment in Scotland's NHS to protect and improve our precious public health service.
World-class childcare and educational support for every child needed to succeed.
Security in retirement, with pensions that are fair and keep pace with the cost of living.
Fresh and progressive policies with the SNP at Westminster for a better future for you.
Responsible economic policies for long-term growth and a more responsible approach to delivering for all.

issues.economy: Responsible economic policies for long-term growth and a more responsible approach to delivering for all.
issues.education: World-class childcare and educational support for every child needed to succeed.
issues.governance: Fresh and progressive policies with the SNP at Westminster for a better future for you.
issues.health: Additional investment in Scotland's NHS to protect and improve our precious public health service.
issues.socialWelfare: Security in retirement, with pensions that are fair and keep pace with the cost of living.

images.caption: Nicola Sturgeon seated with a caption: 'We will play a constructive role with new ideas and fresh thinking.'
